mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_alam_hist.select */ SELECT alam_no /* alam_no 알림_번호 numeric */ ,guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */ ,stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ ,alam_chnl_cd /* alam_chnl_cd 알림_채널_코드 character varying(20) */ ,alam_type_cd /* alam_type_cd 알림_유형_코드 character varying(20) */ ,alam_titl /* alam_titl 알림_제목 character varying(200) */ ,alam_cntn /* alam_cntn 알림_내용 text */ ,ref_url /* ref_url 참조_URL character varying(500) */ ,ref_data /* ref_data 참조_데이터 character(18) */ ,send_dttm /* send_dttm 발송_일시 character(14) */ ,send_rslt_cd /* send_rslt_cd 발송_결과_코드 character varying(20) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ts_alam_hist WHERE 1 = 1 AND alam_no = #{alamNo} /* alam_no 알림_번호 numeric */ AND guar_no = #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_alam_hist.insert */ INSERT INTO ts_alam_hist ( alam_no /* alam_no 알림_번호 numeric */ ,guar_no /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */
,stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */
,alam_chnl_cd /* alam_chnl_cd 알림_채널_코드 character varying(20) */
,alam_type_cd /* alam_type_cd 알림_유형_코드 character varying(20) */
,alam_titl /* alam_titl 알림_제목 character varying(200) */
,alam_cntn /* alam_cntn 알림_내용 text */
,ref_url /* ref_url 참조_URL character varying(500) */
,ref_data /* ref_data 참조_데이터 character(18) */
,send_dttm /* send_dttm 발송_일시 character(14) */
,send_rslt_cd /* send_rslt_cd 발송_결과_코드 character varying(20) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{alamNo} /* alam_no 알림_번호 numeric */ ,#{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */
,#{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */
,#{alamChnlCd} /* alam_chnl_cd 알림_채널_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{alamTypeCd} /* alam_type_cd 알림_유형_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{alamTitl} /* alam_titl 알림_제목 character varying(200) */
,#{alamCntn} /* alam_cntn 알림_내용 text */
,#{refUrl} /* ref_url 참조_URL character varying(500) */
,#{refData} /* ref_data 참조_데이터 character(18) */
,#{sendDttm} /* send_dttm 발송_일시 character(14) */
,#{sendRsltCd} /* send_rslt_cd 발송_결과_코드 character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_alam_hist.update */ UPDATE ts_alam_hist
,stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */
,alam_chnl_cd = #{alamChnlCd} /* alam_chnl_cd 알림_채널_코드 character varying(20) */
,alam_type_cd = #{alamTypeCd} /* alam_type_cd 알림_유형_코드 character varying(20) */
,alam_titl = #{alamTitl} /* alam_titl 알림_제목 character varying(200) */
,alam_cntn = #{alamCntn} /* alam_cntn 알림_내용 text */
,ref_url = #{refUrl} /* ref_url 참조_URL character varying(500) */
,ref_data = #{refData} /* ref_data 참조_데이터 character(18) */
,send_dttm = #{sendDttm} /* send_dttm 발송_일시 character(14) */
,send_rslt_cd = #{sendRsltCd} /* send_rslt_cd 발송_결과_코드 character varying(20) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND alam_no = #{alamNo} /* alam_no 알림_번호 numeric */ AND guar_no = #{guarNo} /* guar_no 보호자_번호 numeric */
